# Valiant Spirit, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]] \[[[Incarnum Spells|incarnum]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF (E)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Up to one creature/level

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 106

As *[[Valiant Spirit (Spell)|valiant spirit]]*, except as noted above. Each target must activate his own *[[Valiant Spirit (Spell)|valiant spirit]]* separately.
